sentences.en: "Without being presumptuous, "he reports, "it has been my main objective for those twenty years to keep the highest possible level of service on what is, after all, a train.
sentences.cn: “没有放肆，”他说，“这是我的主要目标是为那些二十年保持最高水准的服务是什么，毕竟，一列火车。”

sentences.en: Behind the presumptuous General loomed the illustrious Marshal Petain.
sentences.cn: 在这位跋扈的将军背后隐然可见很有名气的贝当元帅的身影.

sentences.en: Clearly, it is presumptuous and immoral for a small group of individuals to keep these things under wraps while there is so much misery on the planet.
sentences.cn: 显然地，一小群人把这些事情保密起来而还有很多人在承受那么多的苦难，这是专横和邪恶的。

sentences.en: Don't make presumptuous comments out of ignorance.
Don't make presumptuous comments out of ignorance. Don't make improper comments before you know the whole story.
sentences.cn: 不要不明原委,就妄加评论.

sentences.en: Dorothea checked herself suddenly with self - rebuke for the presumptuous way.
sentences.cn: 多萝西娅想到这里,蓦地打住了,责备自己捕风捉影.

sentences.en: He was presumptuous in making the announcement before the decision had been approved.
sentences.cn: 决议尚未通过他已径自宣布.

sentences.en: I think he realizes that his presumptuous little flirtation is over.
sentences.cn: 我想他明白他那狂妄的小小的调情已经完了.
这种推论是否太抽象了?

sentences.en: It is too presumptuous of him to do so.
It is too presumptuous of you to say so.
It is, in a way , presumptuous for a foreigner to teach Spanish.
sentences.cn: 外国人教西班牙语可多少有点自不量力.

sentences.en: It was presumptuous of him to take charge.
It would be presumptuous to judge what the outcome will be.
sentences.cn: 现在就判断结果将会怎样未免有些冒昧。

sentences.en: One should never be presumptuous and opinionated.
Their feeling is rather presumptuous insolence.
sentences.cn: 他们的感觉是相当的专横傲慢.

sentences.en: Would it be presumptuous of me to ask you to contribute?
sentences.cn: 可否冒昧请求你出一份力?

trans.tran_cn: 自以为是的，专横的，冒失的
trans.tran_en: doing something that you have no right to do and that seems rude
